name: Don House
text:
I wish I could give ZERO*, I just placed a order online @park hills location an spent 21$ to get THIS!!
I AM SO DISAPPOINTED I love @park hills and its a Shame that this business would let THIS WALK OUT THE DOOR   NEVER EVER ORDERING FROM SNAPPY AGAIN

name: Porsha Courtney
text: Horrible food and customer service. Me and my fiance decided to have a pizza night and order take out. We ordered online then we get a phone call 10 minutes later saying can we come pick up the pizza because there is only 1 driver and who …More

name: Louis G
text: Quality and service have been upped incredibly, dining options now with Booth seating and outdoor patio seating. Attentive customer service and accepting coupons once again. Best sauce of any chain. New ownership is also offering slices! $3 …More

name: samantha Springer
text: Absolutely worst customer service I've seen!!! For an OWNER to refer to himself as "Harry Testicles" while dealing with an unsatisfied customer is ridiculous. For a "man" threaten a woman who is trying to return unacceptable food  instead of trying to resolve the issue is appalling!!

name: Ethan Palmer
text: Terrible service, worse pizza. Avoid this place like the plague it is.

name: Eddie Brady
text: Extremely disrespectful "manager/owner" refused to take refund and THREATENED customer.

name: Brad Niehaus
text: The hours posted online indicate they are open until midnight eastern; however when I called @ 11:28 on a Friday evening, I was advised they were closing  in 30 seconds "sorry" and the line disconnected. …More

name: Trinity Smith
text: ZERO STARS. 1.) don’t serve people cold, uncooked calzones. 2.) just bc you out the cheese on the bottom, and (way too much) sauce on top of a normal pizza crust does NOT make it a “Chicago deep dish”. 3.) pretty sure breadsticks are …More

name: keith adams
text: Why anyone would waste there time or money on this store! Worst managed pizza place ever   don't ever order there big meaty wings what a damn joke let alone the cheap ass ingredients they use for pizza .if you live in park hills call angelos in covington they deliver and soooo much better

name: Brandon Combs
text: Tried to place an order with a coupon from Reach magazine and was told they do not accept them. Called another location.
